events.message: We have received the application from John Doe for the software engineer position. The resume looks promising with relevant experience in Java and cloud technologies.
The candidate's profile has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on skills in software development and devops practices as mentioned in the resume.
Recruiter Alice Smith has been assigned to John Doeâ€™s application to handle subsequent communications and scheduling interviews.
The initial phone screening with John went very well. He demonstrated strong knowledge of software engineering principles and showed enthusiasm for the role.
John responded promptly to the screening follow-up email and confirmed his availability for the technical interview next week.
The technical interview has been scheduled for John on 2024-05-10 at 10 AM UTC with the senior software engineering panel.
